languages.text:
For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior stays on their feet, even if their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach zero. The Warrior also strikes back when receiving attacks and guards allies in a 3-cell radius around them, jumping in and striking enemies with preemptively, making enemy attacks 50% easier to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
! Requires a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon.
languages.original_text:
Воин держится на ногах в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}, даже если запас его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} опускается до нуля. Получая попадания, воин наносит удары в ответ. Также он защищает союзников в радиусе 3 клеток: прыжком приближается к врагу и наносит упреждающий удар, усиливающий {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} от атак этого противника на 50%.
! Требуется {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашное{/g} оружие.

traits.locale_text:
For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Fighter stays on their feet, even if their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach zero. The Fighter also strikes back when receiving attacks and guards allies in a 3-cell radius around them, jumping in and striking enemies with preemptively, making enemy attacks 50% easier to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}.
! Requires a melee weapon.

traits.locale_text:
Боец держится на ногах в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}, даже если запас его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} опускается до нуля. Получая попадания, боец наносит удары в ответ. Также он защищает союзников в радиусе 3 клеток: прыжком приближается к врагу и наносит упреждающий удар, усиливающий {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} от атак этого противника на 50%.
! Требуется рукопашное оружие.

Боец держится на ногах в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}, даже если запас его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} опускается до нуля. Получая попадания, боец наносит удары в ответ. Также он защищает союзников в радиусе 3 клеток: прыжком приближается к врагу и наносит упреждающий удар, усиливающий {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} от атак этого противника на 50%.
! Требуется рукопашное оружие.

languages.text:
在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，战士奋勇作战，即便{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}耗尽时也不会倒下。在这段时间内，每当战士遭到攻击时都会进行反击，同时还会守护3格内所有盟友，令盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}率提高50%。
！此能力需要使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器。
languages.original_text:
For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior stays on their feet, even if their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach zero. The Warrior also strikes back when receiving attacks and guards allies in a 3-cell radius around them, jumping in and striking enemies with preemptively, making enemy attacks 50% easier to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
! Requires a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon.

traits.locale_text:
在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，战士奋勇作战，即便{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}耗尽时也不会倒下。在这段时间内，每当战士遭到攻击时都会进行反击，同时还会守护3格内所有盟友，令盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}率提高50%。
！此能力需要使用近战武器。

在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}奋勇作战，即便{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}耗尽时也不会倒下。在这段时间内，每当战士遭到攻击时都会进行反击，同时还会守护3格内所有盟友，令盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}率提高50%。
！此能力需要使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器。

languages.text:
ファイターは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}がゼロに到達しても倒れない。ファイターは攻撃を受けると反撃し、周囲半径3セル以内の味方をガードし、敵に飛び込んで先制攻撃し、敵の攻撃を50%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}しやすくする。
！{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器が必要。
languages.original_text:
For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior stays on their feet, even if their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach zero. The Warrior also strikes back when receiving attacks and guards allies in a 3-cell radius around them, jumping in and striking enemies with preemptively, making enemy attacks 50% easier to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
! Requires a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon.

traits.locale_text:
ファイターは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}がゼロに到達しても倒れない。ファイターは攻撃を受けると反撃し、周囲半径3セル以内の味方をガードし、敵に飛び込んで先制攻撃し、敵の攻撃を50%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}しやすくする。
！{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器が必要。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}がゼロに到達しても自らの足で立つ。ファイターは攻撃を受けると反撃し、周囲半径3セル以内の味方をガードし、敵に飛び込んで先制攻撃し、敵の攻撃を50%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}しやすくする。
！{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器が必要。

languages.text:
El guerrero se mantiene en pie durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} aunque sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} lleguen a cero. Además, contraataca cualquier ataque y protege a los aliados que estén a un radio de 3 casillas a su alrededor, saltando hacia los enemigos y golpeándolos al instante, por lo que los ataques enemigos son un 50 % más fáciles de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g}.
! Requiere un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
languages.original_text:
For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior stays on their feet, even if their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach zero. The Warrior also strikes back when receiving attacks and guards allies in a 3-cell radius around them, jumping in and striking enemies with preemptively, making enemy attacks 50% easier to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
! Requires a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon.

traits.locale_text:
El guerrero se mantiene en pie durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} aunque sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} lleguen a cero. Además, contraataca cualquier ataque y protege a los aliados que estén a un radio de 3 casillas a su alrededor, saltando hacia los enemigos y golpeándolos al instante, por lo que los ataques enemigos son un 50 % más fáciles de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g}.
! Requiere un arma cuerpo a cuerpo.

languages.text:
Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang bleibt der Krieger auch dann auf den Beinen, wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} auf 0 sniken. Der Krieger schlägt angegriffen wird, und beschützt Verbündete in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um sich herum. Er greift Feinde präventiv an, wodurch er feindlichen Angriffen 50 % leichter {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} kann.
Benötigt eine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g}.
languages.original_text:
For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior stays on their feet, even if their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach zero. The Warrior also strikes back when receiving attacks and guards allies in a 3-cell radius around them, jumping in and striking enemies with preemptively, making enemy attacks 50% easier to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
! Requires a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon.

traits.locale_text:
Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang bleibt der Krieger auf den Beinen, auch wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} auf 0 stehen. Der Krieger schlägt auch zurück, wenn er angegriffen wird, und beschützt Verbündete in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um sich herum. Er schreitet ein und greift Feinde präventiv an, sodass das {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} feindlicher Angriffe um 50 % leichter fällt.
! Benötigt eine Nahkampfwaffe.

languages.text:
Pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le guerrier reste debout, même si ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} tombent à zéro. Le guerrier riposte aussi aux éventuelles attaques et protège ses alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui, sautant et frappant les ennemis de manière préventive, ce qui rend les attaques ennemies 50 % plus faciles à {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g}.
! Nécessite une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}.
languages.original_text:
For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior stays on their feet, even if their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach zero. The Warrior also strikes back when receiving attacks and guards allies in a 3-cell radius around them, jumping in and striking enemies with preemptively, making enemy attacks 50% easier to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
! Requires a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon.

traits.locale_text:
Pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le Combattant reste debout, même si ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} atteignent zéro. Le Combattant riposte aussi aux éventuelles attaques et protège ses alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui, sautant et frappant les ennemis de manière préventive, rendant les attaques ennemies 50 % plus faciles à {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g}.
! Nécessite une arme de mêlée.

languages.text:
Savaşçı, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı sıfıra inmiş olsa bile bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca ayakta kalmaya devam eder. Ayrıca savaşçı; saldırıya maruz kaldığında geri saldırır ve kendisine en fazla 3 hücre uzaklıkta bulunan dost birimleri korur, sıçrayarak düşmanlara caydırıcı saldırılar gerçekleştirir ve düşman saldırısından {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınmayı{/g} %50 daha kolay hâle getirir.
! {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş{/g} silahı gerektirir.
languages.original_text:
For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Warrior stays on their feet, even if their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach zero. The Warrior also strikes back when receiving attacks and guards allies in a 3-cell radius around them, jumping in and striking enemies with preemptively, making enemy attacks 50% easier to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
! Requires a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon.
